mapper.sql: id, name, growth_point, default_status, free_freight_point, comment_growth_point, privilege_free_freight, privilege_sign_in, privilege_comment, privilege_promotion, privilege_member_price, privilege_birthday, note
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ums_member_level
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ums_member_level (name, growth_point, default_status, free_freight_point, comment_growth_point, privilege_free_freight, privilege_sign_in, privilege_comment, privilege_promotion, privilege_member_price, privilege_birthday, note) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{growthPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defaultStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freeFreightPoint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commentGrowthPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegeFreeFreight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegeSignIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegeComment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegePromotion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegeMemberPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegeBirthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
